Style/FormatStringToken.description:
Description

Use a consistent style for format string tokens.
Style/FormatStringToken.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: annotated (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['annotated', 'template', 'unannotated'] (type: list)
MaxUnannotatedPlaceholdersAllowed: 1 (type: int)
Mode: aggressive (type: str)
AllowedMethods: [] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
